name: Wormhole Dive
description:
In this game you control a ship in a everchanging wormhole. Your ship can store kinect energy from pendular motion to send it forward as a powerful shockwave that can destroy even the hardest objects.

Controls:

  • Arrows to move left/right
  • CTRL to shoot
  • Space for special power if enough kinect energy

Credits:
